title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately causes changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately causes changes
OB: After removing a working set, the package view in the background refilters.
EB: The package view should only be refiltered when closing the working set selection dialog, not during manipulations. Additionally, pressing cancel should cancel all changes made to working sets, including the removal.
SR:
20020418

1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and delete the first working set.
